top_comments.comment: Democrats are the enemy of the TAX paying American Citizen, just send those criminals packing in 2022...

comments_since_last_sample.body: What's these congressmen going to do just wine and not stop biden until we're speaking Chinese.
Why can't Biden be stopped before it's all over for us. Look how Trump was impeached over nothing.This guy killed Americans. Ruining our way. When is this chatter going to stop and action taken.
